text: Bricostore is a type of French hypermarket. They sell do-it-yourself (DIY) goods. ==Bricostore in Europe== Country First hypermarket Number of hypermarkets Hungary 1998 9 Romania 2002 13 Croatia 2004 3 == Other websites == * Bricostore Romania * Bricostore Hungary * Bricostore Croatia Category:Supermarkets of Europe Category:1850s establishments in France Category:1850 establishments in Europe Category:Retail companies of France
title: Bricostore
